Factsheet

Sean Bernhard

Release date:

Website:
sbernhard15.github.io/twine/
Regular Price:

Description

A thief awakens inside of a disgusting jail cell with no memory of his crime. To escape, he must use their wits, words, or ways with weapons!

History

Features

  • Tremendous fun at ALL TIMES! An exciting text adventure!
  • Investigate your surroundings to gain an upper hand, then relive the same day to hasten your escape plan.
  • Are you a bloodthirsty brigand or a friend to animals? Attack your dungeon captors or communicate with animals to gain an upper hand.
  • Interact with man, animal, and even stale bread to formulate an escape!
